title: Create Implementation Roadmap and Success Metrics PRD Section

requirements: Create 1 comprehensive implementation roadmap document (6-8 pages) covering 12-24 month execution plan
Document 4 phases: Phase 1 MVP (months 1-6), Phase 2 Optimization (months 7-12), Phase 3 AI Enhancement (months 13-18), Phase 4 Scale (months 19-24)
Include 15+ KPIs and success metrics across user acquisition, conversion, revenue, technical performance
Document 8-10 business risks with mitigation strategies
Include 4 quarterly milestones with deliverables and success criteria
Integrate metrics from product-manager/analysis-metrics.md and roadmap timeline from analysis-roadmap.md
acceptance: 1 roadmap document created: verify by ls docs/PRD-Implementation-Roadmap.md
4 phases documented: verify by grep -c '## Phase [1-4]:' docs/PRD-Implementation-Roadmap.md = 4
15+ KPIs documented: verify by grep -c 'KPI\|metric\|target' docs/PRD-Implementation-Roadmap.md >= 15
8+ risks with mitigation: verify by grep -c 'Risk [0-9]\+:' docs/PRD-Implementation-Roadmap.md >= 8
4 quarterly milestones: verify by grep -c 'Q[1-4]\|Quarter [1-4]\|Month [1-9]' docs/PRD-Implementation-Roadmap.md >= 4

context: Feature specifications completed with 20 features across 4 phases

shared_context.roadmap_framework: Phased delivery (MVP → Optimization → AI Enhancement → Scale)
conventions: Reference RICE scores from feature specs

logic_flow: Read all roadmap and metrics files from pre_analysis outputs
Extract Phase 1 (Months 1-6): 6 MVP features, 100+ users, $500-1500 MRR, 10-15% conversion
Extract Phase 2 (Months 7-12): 4 optimization features, 1000+ users, $5000-7000 MRR, 12-15% conversion

Extract KPIs: user acquisition, conversion rate, MRR, churn, AI accuracy, performance metrics

implementation_approach.title: Create implementation roadmap document
implementation_approach.description: Write comprehensive roadmap markdown with phase breakdowns, KPIs, milestones, and risk management
modification_points: Include 5 main sections: Overview, Phase Roadmaps (4 phases), Success Metrics & KPIs, Quarterly Milestones, Risk Management
Document 4 phases with objectives, features, timelines, success criteria, resource requirements
Include 15-20 KPIs organized by category (acquisition, conversion, revenue, technical, engagement)
Document 8-10 business risks with likelihood, impact, mitigation strategies, success metrics
Add 4 quarterly milestone tables with deliverables and quality gates
logic_flow: Create docs/PRD-Implementation-Roadmap.md with proper frontmatter
Write Overview section: 12-24 month vision, phased approach rationale, critical path (1 page)
Write Phase 1 (Months 1-6) section (1.5 pages):
- Objectives: Launch freemium platform, validate paid mailing
- Core features: 6 MVP features (AI scanner, letter gen, mailing, dashboard, stats, rate limiting)
- Success criteria: 100+ users, $500-1500 MRR, 10-15% conversion, 95%+ AI accuracy, 0 FCRA issues
- Timeline: Month-by-month feature delivery plan
Write Phase 2 (Months 7-12) section (1.5 pages): Optimization focus, USPS migration, 1000+ users, $5000-7000 MRR
Write Phase 3 (Months 13-18) section (1.5 pages): AI enhancement, premium tier, 5000+ users, $30000-35000 MRR
Write Phase 4 (Months 19-24) section (1.5 pages): Scale, mobile app, B2B tools, 15000+ users, $100000+ MRR
Write Success Metrics & KPIs section (1.5 pages):
- User Acquisition: signups, active users, CAC
- Conversion: free-to-paid rate, premium tier adoption, repeat purchase
- Revenue: MRR, ARPU, LTV, churn
- Technical: AI accuracy, API response time, uptime
- Engagement: letters generated, disputes tracked, NPS
Write Quarterly Milestones section (1 page): Q1-Q8 deliverables with quality gates
Write Risk Management section (1.5 pages): 8-10 risks with mitigation, monitoring, success metrics
Validate all phases have quantified success criteria and timelines

implementation_approach.title: Validate roadmap document completeness
implementation_approach.description: Verify all phases, KPIs, milestones, and risks are documented with quantified targets
modification_points: Validate 4 phases documented: verify grep count of '## Phase [1-4]:' = 4
Validate 15+ KPIs present: verify metric references count
Validate quarterly milestones: verify Q1-Q8 or Month 1-24 references
Validate quantified targets: verify all success criteria have numbers (users, MRR, conversion %)
logic_flow: Run grep validation commands from acceptance criteria
Count phases, KPI entries, risk sections, quarterly references
Verify all phases have quantified success criteria (users, MRR, conversion, technical metrics)

Cross-check MRR targets and user growth projections are consistent across sections
